channel.title: Sleep on VitaminDWiki
channel.description: Recent content in Sleep on VitaminDWiki

item.title: Rotating shift workers have 3X higher risk of sleep problems if low Vitamin D
item.description:
Association of Hypovitaminosis D with Sleep Parameters in Rotating Shift Worker Drivers

Sleep Sci 2023; 16(01): 084-091 DOI: 10.1055/s-0043-1767748

Luiz Antônio Alves de Menezes-Júnior , Virgínia Capistrano Fajardo , Raimundo Marques do

Nascimento Neto , Sílvia Nascimento de Freitas , Fernando Luiz Pereira Oliveira , Fausto Aloísio Pedrosa Pimenta , George Luiz Lins Machado-Coelho , Adriana Lúcia Meireles

Objective To evaluate the association between sleep parameters and hypovitaminosis D in rotating shift drivers.

item.title: Poor sleep was 2X more likely if low Vitamin D and poor Vitamin D receptor
item.description:
• The role of interaction between vitamin D and VDR FokI gene polymorphism (rs2228570) in sleep quality of adults

The role of interaction between vitamin D and VDR FokI gene polymorphism (rs2228570) in sleep quality of adults

Sci Rep. 2024 Apr 7;14(1):8141. doi: 10.1038/s41598-024-58561-2.

Luiz Antônio Alves de Menezes-Júnior 1 2 3, Thais da Silva Sabião 4 5, Samara Silva de Moura 4 5, Aline Priscila Batista 6 7, Mariana Carvalho de Menezes 4 5 8, Júlia Cristina Cardoso Carraro 4 5 8, George Luiz Lins Machado-Coelho 4 6 7, Adriana Lúcia Meireles 4 5 8
